content: मुकुलः --लं {@--1@} A bud; आविर्भूतप्रथममुकुलाः कंदलीश्चानुकच्छं <ls>Me. 21</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 31</ls>; <ls n="R.">15. 99.</ls> {@--2@} Anything like a bud; आलक्ष्यदंतमुकुलान् (तनयान्) <ls>Ś. 7. 17.</ls> {@--3@} The body. {@--4@} The soul or spirit. {@--5@} A bud-like junction of the fingers. (मुकुलीकृ means ‘to close in the form of a bud’; <ls>Ku. 5. 63</ls>).
